attributes.action: Curb the production of plastic mini toys
attributes.background: There is a determined effort to reduce plastic bag use but consider the number of these plastic creatures which will take hundreds of years to degrade. Advertising on kids TV time creates mass demand and should be banned.

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like the Government to take steps to reduce the production of plastic mini toys, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like to see. 

You might wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250177

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/265949

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249877

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
